thread.title: BRIEF-Titan International Reports Q4 Loss Per Share Of $0.55

title: BRIEF-Titan International Reports Q4 Loss Per Share Of $0.55
text: February 23, 2018 / 11:04 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Titan International Reports Q4 Loss Per Share Of $0.55 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 23 (Reuters) - Titan International Inc: * TITAN INTERNATIONAL, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 NET SALES OF $376.0 MILLION, UP 22 PERCENT YOY * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.55 * Q4 SALES ROSE 22 PERCENT TO $376 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $0.10 * TITAN INTERNATIONAL - ASSET IMPAIRMENT OF $9.9 MILLION RECORDED IN QUARTER RELATING TO FIRE AT TITAN TIRE RECLAMATION CORP Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
